articles.title: Mississippi State AD John Cohen 'deeply concerned' about bowl brawl with Tulsa - USA TODAY
articles.description: Mississippi State AD John Cohen wasn't happy about the Bulldogs' nasty brawl with Tulsa after the Armed Forces Bowl, saying he was "deeply concerned."
